description: Comprehensive Logan Security Dashboard Working Queries

network_analysis.name: Network Analysis
network_analysis.description: VCN Flow logs and network traffic analysis

queries.name: All Log Sources Count
queries.description: Count of log records by source type
queries.query: * | stats count as logrecords by 'Log Source' | sort -logrecords

queries.name: All Network Traffic Volume
queries.description: Network traffic volume analysis with trend comparison
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'OCI VCN Flow Unified Schema Logs' | eval vol = unit('Content Size Out', byte) | stats sum(vol) as Volume, trend(sum(vol)) | compare timeshift = auto

queries.name: Top 10 Denied Connections by Source
queries.description: Most frequent denied/dropped connections by source IP
queries.query: 'Log Source' in ('OCI VCN Flow Unified Schema Logs') and Action in (drop, reject) | rename 'Source IP' as Source | stats count by Source | top 10 Count

queries.name: Top 10 Destination Ports by Traffic
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'OCI VCN Flow Unified Schema Logs' | eval vol = unit('Content Size Out', byte) | stats sum(vol) as Volume by 'Destination Port' | top 10 Volume

queries.name: Top 10 Windows Failed Logins
queries.description: Failed Windows authentication attempts by account
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Security Events' and 'Security Result' = denied | fields 'Security Actor Endpoint Account', 'Security Category', 'Security Result', 'Security Command', 'Security Action', 'Security Actor Endpoint Name', 'Security Destination Endpoint Network Name', 'Security Destination Resource' | stats count by 'Security Destination Endpoint Account' | sort -Count | head 10

queries.name: Failed SSH Logins by Destination
queries.query: 'Security Original Name' in (sshd, ssh) and 'Security Category' = authentication.login and 'Security Result' = denied | fields 'Security Actor Endpoint Network Address' as Destination | timestats count as Count by Destination

suricata_ids.name: Suricata IDS Analysis
suricata_ids.description: Suricata intrusion detection system logs and alerts

queries.name: Suricata Signature Analysis
queries.query: 'Log Source' = com.oraclecloud.logging.custom.Suricatalogs | fields SuricataSignature, SuricataSignatureID | stats count as logrecords by SuricataSignature | sort -logrecords

queries.name: Suricata Signature IDs
queries.description: Analysis by Suricata signature ID frequency
queries.query: 'Log Source' = com.oraclecloud.logging.custom.Suricatalogs | fields SuricataSignature, SuricataSignatureID | stats count as logrecords by SuricataSignatureID | sort -logrecords

queries.name: Suricata Alert Signature Percentage
queries.query: 'Log Source' = com.oraclecloud.logging.custom.Suricatalogs and 'Event Type' = alert | fields SuricataSignature, SuricataSignatureID, 'Event Type', -'Host Name (Server)', -Entity, -'Entity Type', -'Problem Priority', -Label, -'Log Source' | stats count as logrecords by SuricataSignature

queries.name: Suricata Alert Destination IP Analysis
queries.query: 'Log Source' = com.oraclecloud.logging.custom.Suricatalogs and 'Event Type' = alert | fields SuricataSignature, SuricataSignatureID, 'Event Type', -'Host Name (Server)', -Entity, -'Entity Type', -'Problem Priority', -Label, -'Log Source' | stats count as logrecords by 'Destination IP'

waf_protection.name: Web Application Firewall
waf_protection.description: WAF protection rules and security analysis

queries.name: WAF Protection Rules Activity
queries.description: WAF protection rules triggered by client IP
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'OCI WAF Logs' and 'Request Protection Rule IDs' != null | stats count('Host IP Address (Client)') by 'Request Protection Rule IDs', 'Host IP Address (Client)'

queries.name: WAF Request Protection Capabilities
queries.description: Analysis of WAF protection capabilities with lookups
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'OCI WAF Logs' and 'Security Module' not like in ('%requestAccessControl%', '%responseAccessControl%', '%requestRateLimiting%', '%requestProtection%') and 'Security Module' != null and 'Request Protection Rule IDs Data' != null | rename 'Request Protection Rule IDs' as 'Request Protection Capabilities' | stats count by 'Request Protection Capabilities' | sort -Count | lookup table = 'Web Application Firewall Protection Capabilities' select Key as Key, Name, Description, Tags, _Version using 'Request Protection Capabilities' = 'Protection Capabilities' | fields Name, Key, Description, _Version | rename _Version as Version

windows_sysmon.name: Windows Sysmon Events
windows_sysmon.description: Windows Sysmon event analysis and MITRE ATT&CK mapping

queries.name: Windows Sysmon Events by ID
queries.description: Sysmon events with MITRE lookup integration
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'Event ID' != null | stats count by 'Event ID' | sort -Count | lookup table = MITRE select 'Event ID' as 'Event ID', 'Event Name', Channel, 'Audit Category', 'OSSEM Id' using 'Event ID' | fields 'Event ID', 'Event Name', Channel, 'Audit Category', 'OSSEM Id'

queries.name: Sysmon Network Events
queries.description: Sysmon network events excluding specific techniques
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'Technique_id' != 'T1574.002' | fields 'Technique_id', 'Destination IP', 'Source IP' | timestats count as logrecords by 'Log Source'

mitre_attack.name: MITRE ATT&CK Analysis
mitre_attack.description: MITRE ATT&CK technique analysis and mapping

queries.name: MITRE Technique ID Frequency
queries.description: Analysis of MITRE technique usage by non-system users
queries.query: 'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and User != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' | timestats count as logrecords by Technique_id
'Log Source' = 'Windows Sysmon Events' and 'User' != 'NT AUTHORITY\\SYSTEM' | timestats count as logrecords by 'Technique_id'

queries.name: All Security Events Overview
queries.description: Comprehensive security events across all sources
queries.query: 'Security Result' != null | stats count by 'Log Source', 'Security Result' | sort -count

queries.name: All Failed Authentication Events
queries.query: 'Security Result' in (denied, failed, failure) | fields 'Log Source', 'Principal Name', 'IP Address', 'Security Result', Time | sort -Time

queries.name: IP Address Activity Analysis
queries.description: Comprehensive IP address activity across all sources
queries.query: 'IP Address' != null | stats count by 'IP Address', 'Log Source' | sort -count | head 50
